tool_description: Determines appropriate ease amounts for different garment types and fits, calculating the difference between body measurements and finished garment dimensions.

garment_type.description: Type of garment (sweater, cardigan, vest, dress, jacket, coat)

desired_fit.description: Intended fit style (close-fitting, fitted, standard, loose, oversized)

garment_style.description: Specific style details (pullover, button-up, wrap, tunic)

error_messages: Body measurement out of range: Must be between 20 and 60 inches.
Unsupported garment type: Use one of [sweater, cardigan, vest, dress, jacket, coat].
Invalid fit style: Use one of [close-fitting, fitted, standard, loose, oversized].
Unsupported garment style: Use one of [pullover, button-up, wrap, tunic].
usage: Provide body_measurement, garment_type, and desired_fit to calculate appropriate ease amounts and finished garment measurements.

finished_measurement.description: Final garment measurement with ease included

ease_description.description: Description of how the garment should fit

adjustment_range.description: Acceptable range for personal preference adjustments
